description: This file contains the implementation of URL handling functionalities, including URL parsing, encoding, decoding, and encoding/decoding in base64. It defines the URL class, its methods, and associated enumerations, and provides utility functions for URL manipulation within the WPEFramework project.

classes.name: URL
classes.description: A class that provides URL parsing, encoding, decoding, and related utilities.

methods.name: void Parse(const TextFragment & urlStr)
methods.description: Parses a given URL string into its components: scheme, username, password, host, port, path, query, and reference.

methods.name: void ParseDomain(const Core::TextFragment & url)
methods.description: Parses the domain part of the URL, extracting hostname and port.

methods.name: string Text() const
methods.description: Constructs and returns the string representation of the URL from its components.

methods.name: uint16_t Base64Decode(const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,uint8_t * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength,const TCHAR * ignoreList)
uint16_t Base64Encode(const uint8_t * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength,const bool padding)
uint32_t CopyFragment(TCHAR * destination,const uint32_t maxLength,uint32_t index,const string & data)
uint16_t Decode(const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength)
uint16_t Encode(const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength)
uint32_t FindNext(const TextFragment & url,const uint32_t start,const uint32_t end)

ctags.name: Base64Decode
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ uint16_t URL::Base64Decode(const TCHAR* source, const uint16_t sourceLength, /
ctags.signature: (const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,uint8_t * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength,const TCHAR * ignoreList)

ctags.name: Base64Encode
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ uint16_t URL::Base64Encode(const uint8_t* source, const uint16_t sourceLength/
ctags.signature: (const uint8_t * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength,const bool padding)

ctags.name: CopyFragment
ctags.pattern: /^    inline static uint32_t CopyFragment(TCHAR* destination, const uint32_t maxLength, uint32_t i/
ctags.signature: (TCHAR * destination,const uint32_t maxLength,uint32_t index,const string & data)

ctags.name: Decode
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ uint16_t URL::Decode(const TCHAR* source, const uint16_t sourceLength, TCHAR*/
ctags.signature: (const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength)

ctags.name: Encode
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ uint16_t URL::Encode(const TCHAR* source, const uint16_t sourceLength, TCHAR*/
ctags.signature: (const TCHAR * source,const uint16_t sourceLength,TCHAR * destination,const uint16_t destinationLength)

ctags.name: FindNext
ctags.pattern: /^    inline static uint32_t FindNext(const TextFragment& url, const uint32_t start, const uint32_/
ctags.signature: (const TextFragment & url,const uint32_t start,const uint32_t end)
